items.text: Check for styles that are overwritten (browser inspect)

items.name: Redux
items.text: Chrome DevTools: Validate state - Check for unused state

items.name: Network
items.text: Chrome DevTools: Check network tab for missing files (images), connection issues, etc.

items.name: Inspect
items.text: Inspect style: Click through elements to check for unused or invalid styles.

items.name: ESLint - Object Property Shorthand
items.text: Set 'object-shorthand' to 'always' or 'warn' in 'rules' section. Property shorthand allows you to omit the property name when it matches the variable name, making the code cleaner.

items.name: TSConfig.json
items.text: Check for new and deprecated options Typescript

items.name: Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)
items.text: visual stability of a page as it loads

items.name: Interaction to Next Paint (INP)
items.text: measures user interface responsiveness.  replaces First Input Delay (FID)

items.name: Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)
items.text: time between the browser starting to load a page and the largest content element appearing

items.name: Input - Click on Label
items.goal: Clicking the label sets focus to or activates the form control

items.name: Delete entry
items.text: 1. Enter value 2. Save 3. Delete value 4. Save

items.name: Chat: Typescript Improvements
items.text: Using typescript [latest version], are there any improvements that can be implemented?

items.name: Chat: Javascript Improvements
items.text: Using javascript ES2025, are there any improvements that can be be implemented?

items.name: Chat: Javascript Improvements2
items.text: Update to use findLast(), findLastIndex(), toSorted(), and toReversed() where applicable.

items.name: Chat: Javascript ES2023 Array Method Improvements
items.text: Update to use findLast(), findLastIndex(), toSorted(), and toReversed() where applicable.

items.name: Chat: Javascript Iterable Type Updates
items.text: Update to use Iterable where applicable.

items.name: Chat: Javascript Iterable Type Updates
items.text: Update to use RegExp.escape where applicable.

items.name: Chat: Javascript RegExp.escape Implementation
items.text: Update to use RegExp.escape where applicable.

items.name: Chat: Javascript RegExp.escape Implementation
items.text: Update to use Promise.try where applicable.

items.name: Chat: Javascript Iteratable
items.notes: 12/25/2025 - Limited browser support.  Check compatibility before implementing (caniuse.com)

items.name: Chat: React Improvements
items.text: Are there react 19.2.3 enhancements that can be made?

items.name: Chat: HTML5
items.text: Is the latest and appropriate HTML5 elements used?

items.name: Chat: CSS
items.text: Are there improvements to CSS that can be made?

items.name: Chat: Styles
items.text: Are there any styles defined in components that should be moved to main.css?

items.name: Chat: Immutable
items.text: Look for opportunties to improve Immutability in codebase.

items.name: Chat: SOLID
items.text: Validate use of SOLID [ Single Responsibility Principle (SRP),  Open/Closed Principle (OCP), Liskov Substitution Principle (LSP), Interface Segregation Principle (ISP), Dependency Inversion Principle (DIP) ] principles in codebase.

items.name: Chat: Class Components
items.text: Convert any class components to functional components and hooks.

items.name: Scripts: Knip
items.notes: Find unused files, dependencies, and exports

items.name: Chat: Error Handling
items.text: Review error handling patterns across the codebase and suggest improvements for user-facing error messages and error recovery

items.name: Chat: Accessibility
items.text: Analyze accessibility (a11y) issues - check for proper ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus management, and screen reader support

items.name: Chat: React Query Optimization
items.text: Review and optimize React Query usage - check staleTime, cacheTime, retry logic, and identify opportunities for prefetching

items.name: Chat: Custom Hooks
items.text: Identify opportunities to create custom hooks to reduce duplication and improve code reusability

items.name: Chat: API Security
items.text: Review API security - validate input sanitization, rate limiting effectiveness, and error information exposure

items.name: Chat: Bundle Size
items.text: Analyze bundle size and suggest code splitting opportunities beyond lazy loading

items.name: Chat: TypeScript Strict Mode
items.text: Review TypeScript strict mode usage and suggest enabling stricter compiler options
items.notes: Some of these feel too strict: e.g., noImplicitAny, strictNullChecks, strictFunctionTypes

items.name: Chat: Prop Drilling
items.text: Identify prop drilling issues and suggest Context API or state management improvements

items.name: Chat: Styled Components Performance
items.text: Review styled-components usage and identify performance issues or patterns to improve

items.name: Chat: Testing
items.text: Suggest implementing React Testing Library tests for critical user flows

items.name: Chat: Form Validation
items.text: Review form validation patterns and suggest consistency improvements using Zod or similar

items.name: Chat: SSR/SSG
items.text: Identify opportunities for Server-Side Rendering or Static Site Generation

items.name: Chat: Image Optimization
items.text: Review and optimize image loading strategies (lazy loading, responsive images, WebP)

items.name: Chat: API Caching
items.text: Analyze API response caching strategies and suggest improvements

items.name: Chat: Memory Leaks
items.text: Check for memory leaks - useEffect cleanup, event listeners, subscriptions

items.name: Chat: Build
items.text: execute npm run build and fix all errors

items.name: Quick Wins
items.value: Add 3 strict flags to client tsconfig: noUncheckedIndexedAccess, noImplicitReturns, exactOptionalPropertyTypes

items.name: Quick Wins
items.value: Verify sanitizeFilePath is applied to all file upload/manipulation endpoints

items.name: Architectural Changes
items.value: Implement CSRF token generation and validation for mutation endpoints - future implementation

items.name: Architectural Changes
items.value: Implement authentication and authorization middleware (JWT, sessions, or OAuth) - future implementation

items.name: Architectural Changes
items.value: Configure Web Application Firewall rules for production deployment - future implementation

items.name: Quick Wins
items.value: check tsconfig.json and update target and lib to 'esnext' (lower case)
items.notes: 12/1/2025 - 'es2025' is not supported by Vite.  Use 'esnext' instead. This is need for features like Promise.try

items.name: Consistency
items.value: Add a display name to every component if missing.  Add the name before the component export.

items.name: Quality
items.value: Review eslint.config files.  Suggest changes and additional linters.

items.name: Quality
items.value: Replace ESLint and Prettier with Biome

items.name: Quality
items.value: Are there any deprecated Typescript or Javascript functions being used?

items.name: Quality
items.value: Review eslint.config files.  Are there any deprecated or missing rules?

items.name: Quality
items.value: Review eslint.config files.  Are there any conflicting or duplicate rules?

items.name: Quality
items.value: Review the code for anti-patterns and suggest improvements.

items.value: Read the package.json files and review the libraries used. Are there suggested replacements for any libraries?

items.name: Quality

items.name: Metrics
items.value: Calculate the maintainability index of the codebase and suggest improvements if below 85.

items.name: Metrics
items.value: Calculate the cyclomatic complexity of the codebase.
items.notes: 12/27/2025: Total Files 471, Average Complexity: 4.53.  Results: Excellent.

items.name: Metrics
items.value: Look for code smells in client and server codebases.

items.value: Look for code duplication in client and server codebases and recommend refactoring.
